com.google.gwt.user.client.dnd
Class DragSourceEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.dnd.DragSourceEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DragSourceEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Event information about the drag source from the DragListener. example : dragWidget.addDragListener(new DragListener() { public void onDropEnter(DragSourceEvent event) { int x = DropSourceEvent.getX(); } .... });

See Also:
Serialized Form
